column3: An aether compass? Aye, one of those turned up the other day. Can't rightly say where it came from, but if you want it, it's yours.
Eh? Aether compass? Don't think I've seen anything like that lying around. Sorry I couldn't be of more help.
Misplaced an aether compas, did you? Well, you're in luck. Got one right here that someone was kind enough to hand over instead of selling to the sutlers. Try not to lose it again, eh?
Looking for an aether compass? 'Fraid you'll find none here. I'll keep an eye out in case one turns up, though.
